column4: Hey folks, trying to set up vpn using pptp. I can login to remote system, but dns for remote does not work.
Any ideas what should I do?
I see the dns servers in resolv.conf
I got the address back for a hostname
yes it does - same dns server is shown is resolv.conf
what does your sudo route -n look like?
that shows that your default route is thro the VPN (ppp0)
login to your box after setting up the tunnel or for setting up the tunnel?
I can login to the box, there are three entries in resolv.conf
do they have  a search domain entry as well?
replace cyberciti.biz with the domain name of your remote box
not the *search* package; add that line to resolv.conf just above the nameserver line
in network-manager where you added the vpn connection
